name: Queen of Cups
fortune_telling: This card represents a woman with an emotional, deeply spiritual nature, likely born between June 11th and July 11th, who uses emotional and spiritual appeals to sway others to her point of view

light: Allowing yourself to be moved by the plight of others
Trusting your feelings to guide you
shadow: Becoming so caught up in matters of Spirit, you become detached from the world
Allowing empathy to disable you (instead of inspire action)
Using psychic abilities to wield covert influence
Wallowing in emotionalism, sentiment, or self-pity

Questions to Ask: How do I handle strong emotions?
To what extent am I a victim of my own feelings?
How can I move from reflection to action?
